title: Wonder Boys Typeface
content:
Does anyone know what Script typeface is used on the titles of the Wonder Boys?

 [‹ Does anybody know this font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203214045/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41679 "Go to previous forum topic") [Twin Princess of Wonder Planet logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203214045/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41682 "Go to next forum topic")
author: moira
